quotations_declare_dago_1.translation: My friend said they would be late.

quotations_declare_dago_3.translation: The teacher told us to be quiet.

quotations_declare_dago_4.translation: My friend said the movie was fun.

quotations_declare_dago_5.translation: My younger sibling said they were tired.

quotations_say_lago_1.translation: I told my friend to come.

quotations_say_lago_3.translation: The teacher told us to study.

quotations_say_lago_4.translation: My friend told me to open the door.

quotations_say_lago_5.translation: My younger sibling told me to come quickly.
